column2: "A new stream is only a tributary. However, this tributary has altered the river's course."
"Multiple streams are starting to converge towards a single end."
"Whether the result is tragedy or liberation... That is for you alone to say."
"We know the answer. That is why I am unable to say anything."
"Knowledge alone cannot tell one what is real. Reality must be experienced for oneself."
"I and We will guide you. We will provide insight, if you require it."
"Whether you accept it or not, you are free to decide for yourself."
"The conclusion you arrive at will be born of your own experience. Knowing that, I am content."
